title: 1. How do technologies look like when they were still being discovered? 2. How did the life of people change back then? 3. Are we going through a similar change right now? 4.What’s in store for the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: How do technologies look like when they were still being discovered?Inspiration,Investor solicitation,Experimentation,Patent application,Prototype, andFinished productSome people become rich and famous from their inventions. Others have a patent to put on their resumes. Still others have the personal satisfaction from having built a better mousetrap.The world never stops innovating and changing.Nobody knows.

Rough and shiny! You look at them, wonder and most people DON’T initially get it.CurrencySome got it, some made things and some traded things. This happened in the stone age!Not really.New shiny things.Love this. 7500 BCE. See what I mean… Oldest obsidian bracelet reveals amazing craftsmen's skills in the eighth millennium BC Precision in the stone age. ;) GO BUILD NEW SHINY THINGS…
